Blog.post: I LOVE KCNCC! I LOVE MYSELF! I LOVE KCPSL! I LOVE +D.A.R.L.I.N.G! Y A Y! *super bored me.lame ritez?*

yayz!! im super happie. tomorrow have my syf training!!! den can leave skool early.hmmm... but i bet u i will be carring a blady heavy baggie coz i m gonna carry my ncc uniform.which is oso the no.3 one... and den my home clothes. coz after training i gonna meet my +D.A.R.L.I.N.G!!!!!!!+ *LOVE SICK* whoops. that is the reason y im over the moon. anyway, i dunno if i still like yj. dats cos i haven seen him for ages. super long. maybe. sighs. u noe. have tons of homework indone. still hafta starch my ncc uni. polish the shoes. pin on the badges. endless tasks undone. oh yea rite. and wad i m doing here? still onto my blog. wellx. im those last min kind. cant help it coz tts me. i guess i betta get going. ble. gotta run!!! byee!!

hey!!long time no write.. hmm... yeah.. i've been missing a lot of things from church.. sobsob.. coz of my training for the ncc day parade... ble.. awfully sad. but yea..i m enjoying training for the parade and oso for my syfoc... hahaz.. den can getta meet my +darling+... yayz!oh yea... anywaez, i hate germaine. from pasir ris sec. she is such a bitch. haix. who gives a damn about her manz.heck wad she said. she wrote in some1's frenster testi dat i was such a 2 headed person. hell to her.. whoopz.. oh yea. many things happened since the hols. and im oredi missing it. i lurve my new time table.some1 pls juz tell me tt it rawkx! cos like we getta finish skool at 12.45 almost everydae.yayz! how good can dat be? aww... anywaez.cyaz laterz.

hey... kinda boring now...my first time having a blog...:) yea anywae, just finished my ncc camp yesterdae n now im missing it...wish it was held longer...hmmm..kcncc rockz!and so does part Bs and Ds too. i lurve the ncos for the wundaful camp..yea. those ncos reading dis, juz wanna thank u ppl for planning dis camp for us yah.. lurve u guy alot!! no one is alone at home so here im stoning.*sighs*.i miss my dear.-_-"

hey2 there.. sighs.. feeling damn glummy today.. pass few days people complaining that i got pms.. sighs.. i guess i really do. stomach hurts badly cos i got my period. its such a dread.. wad to do? sighs.. den was fucking pissed off with nicholas leong yesterdae.. he go ask lionel to check me out. wad the shit... and lionel is one kinda irritating person too... nicholas messaged me den lionel so extraanna find out about us. sighs.. i guess i cant trust lionel after wad he done to me last time.. and im still pissed over wad he did... ok.. but i admit that he is kinda a nice guy thou.. oh yar.. yesterday went beach road with ria and june to get presents for the R.O.D... was super fun.. with mastter tagging along.. haha.. but go home so tired.. argued with my daddy.. and i miss my darling super loads.. +wj on my mind 24-7+

+blog updating in process+ please wait........ haha.. yayz!finally! been a long time since i last logged on to my bloggie.. haha.. wellz.. life is totally rocking for me now.. yea rite.. who m i deciving? life is miserable so far.. but the ncc part is just going great! about me.. too lost in dis damn thing. i hate life. partt of it only thou. master marcus is damn sweet.. he spent over 80 bucks on me... now i feel damn guilty. i told him i didnt wan the stuffs.. bit he insisted!! awww man.. i feel damn guilty!! its like 25 for dinner, 20 for lightsticks!! omg!! 20 for lightsticks alone..!!=p.. gotta go soon.. tell u in details later..

broke up with my guyfren... cos ssg grace knew about it already... haix.. it just ended like that.. our 2 months gone down the drain.. sighs.. some times i really wonder why we r not allowed to have any relationships with an officer..?just becos we r only a cadet?we r humans too..='[ its really unfair... hmmm... sighs.. uh oh.. sgt kf sitting beside me.. whoops.. no more privacy... i really dun wan dis to happen... he just suggested that we break cos he didnt an me to get into any trouble. i still cant believe that... i cant accept the fact... some one please just tell me that its all just a nightmare. get me out of here......
yay yay yaya... i got my new blog.. dis blog so not nice... anyway ppl who wanna check out my new blog can alwaes ask me 4 the addie okaex? haha...

sobsob... syf is over.. and im missing it. blex.. i miss my cresent frenz.. and my cousin... haix.. now my saturdays are so empty... coz there will no longer be training and stufz... sobsob... i miss syf!!! i wish it was longer.. den we have more trainings.. thou the training sesions mite be long n tiring.. i dun mind the trainings. and i realy appreciate wad the cpls have done for us in the syf.. its like there were too many ppl in our cont so theyt sacrifice for us n they let us narch. they r really damn sweet.. cpls 2004.. u guy rawk!

haix... in my no3 now... haha..the ncc day thing got screwed up cos of the rain.. n tt was so awfully bad... haix.. anw, got out 2gather wiv my honey yesterdae.. hahas. was unforgettable.. x]... yayx.. so sian..wanna go off the line le... muackis. laters maybe.
i went to goh!! finally.. thank god!!arh.. hahah.. gotta make it really short good bye. i love water jug foreva.

damn. i hate life. oh wow. ncos noe im still with weijie. how? break up is the only solution. i really wanna find out who the bitch is. the one that betrayed me. the cunning one. the one who caused my breakup. that person is gonna pay for it. she is so gonna get it. watch out whoever u r.
